languages.text: Устройство, которое сейчас явно служит для разрубания тел на куски, когда-то было простым вентилятором охлаждения.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Когда-то безопасный вентилятор охлаждения насоса теперь используется как мясорубка

languages.text: The device, now evidently used to chop bodies into pieces, was once an ordinary cooling fan.
languages.original_text: Устройство, которое сейчас явно служит для разрубания тел на куски, когда-то было простым вентилятором охлаждения.

traits.locale_text: The device that is now evidently being used to chop bodies into pieces was once an ordinary cooling fan.
The device that is now evidently being used to chop bodies into pieces was once an ordinary cooling fan.
The device, now evidently being used to chop bodies into pieces, was once an ordinary cooling fan.
The device, now evidently being used to chop bodies into pieces, was once an ordinary cooling fan.

The device, now evidently used to chop bodies into pieces, was once an ordinary cooling fan.

languages.text: 这个装置原本只是个普通的冷却风扇，现在用来将尸体切成碎片。
languages.original_text: The device, now evidently used to chop bodies into pieces, was once an ordinary cooling fan.

traits.locale_text: 这个装置原本只是个普通的冷却风扇，现在用来将尸体切成碎片。

languages.text: Este dispositivo que ahora se usa claramente para despedazar cadáveres fue en su momento un simple ventilador de techo.
languages.original_text: The device, now evidently used to chop bodies into pieces, was once an ordinary cooling fan.

traits.locale_text: Este dispositivo que ahora se usa claramente para despedazar cadáveres fue en su momento un simple ventilador de techo.

languages.text: 装置は見たところ、遺体を細断することに使われているようだ。昔は普通の冷却ファンだった。
languages.original_text: The device, now evidently used to chop bodies into pieces, was once an ordinary cooling fan.

traits.locale_text: 装置は見たところ、遺体を細断することに使われているようだ。昔は普通の冷却ファンだった。

languages.text: Das Gerät, mit dem jetzt offensichtlich Leichen zerteilt werden, war früher ein gewöhnlicher Ventilator zum Kühlen.
languages.original_text: The device, now evidently used to chop bodies into pieces, was once an ordinary cooling fan.

traits.locale_text: Das Gerät, mit dem jetzt offensichtlich Leichen zerteilt werden, war früher ein gewöhnlicher Ventilator zum Kühlen.

languages.text: Cet appareil, manifestement utilisé pour tailler des corps en morceaux, était autrefois utilisé comme un simple ventilateur.
languages.original_text: The device, now evidently used to chop bodies into pieces, was once an ordinary cooling fan.

traits.locale_text: Cet appareil, manifestement utilisé pour tailler des corps en morceaux, était autrefois utilisé comme un simple ventilateur.

languages.text: Beden parçalamak için kullanıldığı anlaşılan bu cihaz, bir zamanlar soğutma görevi gören bir pervaneymiş.
languages.original_text: The device, now evidently used to chop bodies into pieces, was once an ordinary cooling fan.

traits.locale_text: Beden parçalamak için kullanıldığı anlaşılan bu cihaz, bir zamanlar soğutma görevi gören bir pervaneymiş.
